column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: fire. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```ttl@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix fo: <http://example.com/ontology/fire#> .fo:Fire a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Fire" ;    rdfs:comment "Considered as a fundamental element representing the heat and passion of all beings." .fo:Cause a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Cause of Fire" ;    rdfs:comment "Different causes that could initiate a fire." .fo:Effect a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Effect of Fire" ;    rdfs:comment "Different consequences that may occur as a result of a fire." .fo:hasCause a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has cause" ;    rdfs:domain fo:Fire ;    rdfs:range fo:Cause .fo:hasEffect a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has effect" ;    rdfs:domain fo:Fire ;    rdfs:range fo:Effect .fo:Arson a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf fo:Cause ;    rdfs:label "Arson" ;    rdfs:comment "Willful and malicious burning or charring of property." .fo:Wildfire a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf fo:Fire ;    rdfs:label "Wildfire" ;    rdfs:comment "A large, destructive fire that spreads quickly over woodland or brush." .fo:AirPollution a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf fo:Effect ;    rdfs:label "Air Pollution" ;    rdfs:comment "The release of particulates, harmful materials into the earth's atmosphere." .fo:Wildfire1 a fo:Wildfire ;    fo:hasCause fo:Arson ;    fo:hasEffect fo:AirPollution .```
